comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: This is a wonderful rural scene. Also has sister image which is more fully catalogued here: www.powerhousemuseum.com/collection/database/?irn=30178 "The Union" harvester by Nicholson & Morrow was an important agricultural innovation, but sold poorly. (ref. www.adb.online.anu.edu.au/biogs/A050344b.htm ) And some more about the harvester wars here: www.abc.net.au/landline/content/2005/s1320660.htm
